body.name: 2PCS WiFi Light Bulb Security Camera Wireless Outdoor 1080P Indoor 360 Degree Security Cameras for Home Security, Smart Motion Detection, Two-Way Audio
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 44 mins
features: 🎦【1080P and Intelligent Night Vision】Light Bulb Security Camera Outdoor Wifi 1080P HD Bulb Security Camera Can provide a clear picture even at night,Intelligent Night Vision provides ordinary night vision and color night vision, you can easily choose according to your own needs.Nice

🎦【360 Degree Pan/Tilt Panoramic Security Camera】Angle 360 degree horizontal rotation, 90 degree vertical turnover, no dead corner looking every corner, no need to worry about the blind area, so that your family and children are more safe and assured.

🎦【Motion Detection and Real-time Alerts】The Light Bulb Security Camera Outdoor 360° degree camera bulb security camera system adopts a highly sensitive motion sensort, Connect the camera to WIFI,When a moving object is detected,it will record the moving picture and notify you through the APP.

🎦【Wireless and Easy To Install】This camera can be installed using a normal E27 bulb base(110V~240V),Then use the mobile phone to download the APP, and use the APP to help the bulb security camera connect to the WIFI. No other operations are required. Note that it takes about 40s to connect the bulb security camera for the first time.

🎦【Two-Way Audio and High Quality Service】Light Bulb Security Camera Outdoor Wifi Built-in microphone and speaker, the bulb security camera can have a conversation between you and your visitor,If you have any question, please contact us.We provide lifetime technical support and services.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 935 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pan panoramic camera bulb 360 degree defend your house. Support factors: for IOS, for Android 4.0 or above PTZ angle: horizontal 355° vertical 60° Function: motion detection/voice intercom/ Infrared LEDs and white LEDs for night vision Audio parameters: built-in microphone/speaker Wireless network: support wifi wireless network pruduct size：17.5x6.5cm

Horizontal 355° Vertical 60°: You can control the camera's viewing angle through the APP to achieve 360-degree viewing without blind spots. Two-way audio: Built-in microphone and speaker. You can talk with your family anytime and anywhere. Easy wireless installation:This camera can be installed with an ordinary E27 bulb base (110V~240V) without additional installation steps. Then you only need to connect the camera system to the router, open the application and set the camera minutes in it.

Full color day and night: Day and night modes auto switch. Even in darkness,light bulb camera can return a clear images. you also can set full color night vision-on manually. Motion detection and real-time alarm: This pan-and-billiard surveillance camera uses a highly sensitive motion sensor. Once connected to the Internet, the camera detects the movement of an object, it will record the motion picture and notify you through the APP. Remote viewing and night vision: Our camera can control the viewing angle through APP, you can remotely view it anytime and anywhere through for iPhone/for Android for phone/for Ipad, you can see clear images even in complete darkness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth my money, motion detector very sensitive!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, a few people had bad reviews but my experience with this product has been nothing but positive, even down to the subscription I figure $100 for a year for my families safety isn't bad at all! My only issue is the motion detector it is very sensitive, especially with the bugs it will constantly send messages whenever it picks up any kind of movement and with the bugs attracted to the light it was sending messages every minute or 2, so we decided to turn it off other than that the picture quality is great, the 2 way audio has a slight delay but it's great I wasn't even expecting that, and I read some reviews saying that they couldn't pick up there camera when they left they're house I checked and I had no issue with that at all! I love this product so I think it was well worth the money, even the $100 subscription for a year, I have an autistic son who likes to elope (sneak out) so besides the alarms and locks these cameras also put me at ease that I don't have to constantly worry about him trying to get out of the house and get to Walmart for cereal and DVDS 😊!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought this was a pretty good deal. Good camera. Nice features. But, over time, I started noticing little things about it that has made me regret buying it. #1.) The follow feature: I love that it has this, but it doesn't work. It will turn the camera the complete opposite way. Then the camera won't follow the person or thing bc it's pointed away from them! So the camera just stays there, most of the time pointed at a brick wall, in my case, unless you turn this feature off.#2.) The app is absolutely terrible! When you try to pull up the history, say the last alert you received. It jumps back to the day before at a completely random time. I have only been able to view the history maybe 3 or 4 times since I've had the cameras. The picture quality is ok I guess. The color night vision is probably the best thing this camera has going for it!#3.) It says it doesn't record continuously, but one of my cameras will. The other one does not and I can't figure out how to change it!Overall, it sucks for ppl who can't sit around and just stayed glued to their cameras at all times. I wished I would have gotten something different bc this one simply is not worth the headache.*New issue.... The cameras will randomly say "poor network connection" but then when I go to the settings and check the network status it tells me that it's "excellent" or "good". I absolutely hate this product and wished I would not have wasted my money! I would not recommend this to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Finally an affordable cam for your security. Clear pics, night vision and even audio. Live responce to intruders!!! Real-time...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Light Bulb cameras stopped working.
reviews.reviewText: The 2 light bulbs cameras work descent for the most part. I have not had them a year yet and one stop working about a month ago and the other stop working early this morning. I have tried resetting them, but no luck. I used these outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have to purchase a subscription to view recordings
reviews.reviewText: I wish I knew before I bought the two cameras that I have to purchase a subscription for me to be able to see recording of activity for past activities Etc if you don't purchase the subscription you will only be able to see real time activity and it will only record for 6 seconds after it senses activity so therefore you will miss whatever it was supposed to record because it record after activity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Work very well but missing the SD cards
reviews.reviewText: My daughter bought a set of these cameras and liked them so much, that I also bought a set. When my daughter unboxed her cameras, they came with two SD cards.When my cameras arrived they did not contain the SD cards and I had to purchase them separately I bought Amazon basics. I haven’t received them yet. I’ll update my review after I insert the SD cards that I presume should’ve came in the original boxThe cameras do work well they’re very clear and overall I’m quite pleased with them but I have reduced them from five stars to four stars because of the missing SD cardsUPDATE:My SD cards arrived. I made every attempt to reconnect the camera with the SD card inserted. However, I was not able to pair the device or get it to recognize the SD card was in it. I had to go and watch a tutorial to make sure I had connected it properly inserted it properly, I made at least four attempts to reconnect the camera in different ways and was unsuccessful. Each time I have reduced my rating from a four to a two. It seems as if they don’t want you to use the SD card they prefer you sign up for their cloud services, which cost $100 per year .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for installation
reviews.reviewText: i really like theses cameras but i want to tell you all something dont plan on getting to far away from your router and these are internet speed hogs they display its in kbps they work great and are convienient just remove a light bulb a standard light socket and screw this puppy in oh and thiers one more thang these things dont fit in some light sockets because thier short and stubby and the cloud record software cost you ..$4.99 a moth every month but they work good just pop a sd card in these puppies and record to the device one minor draw back it doesnt appear you can check all your footage without having to remove the sd card from the camera and install it in your computer they work good except ive had them for a little over a month and my wireless connectivity stinks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera is crippled by terrible software support. The app itself if you can find it, the included QR code goes to a website with a link that does not work, does nothing more than let you view the camera. All features are disabled, even if you have an SD card, unless you subscribe to their service. Once subscribed you can actually properly move the camera and view recorded footage. The motion detection is awful and constantly goes off when there is absolutely nothing there to trigger it. I purchased the two pack and will not even take the second camera out of the box.
